results.name: Merchandising
results.description: Understand merchandising and outline its importance, Key merchandising aspects,  Merchandising activities, Understanding the benefits of merchandising.

results.name: Customer service
results.description: Define marketing and state its importance, Customer attraction and retention, Types of marketing efforts, Investment of time and money.

results.name: Record keeping
results.description: Outline the importance of keeping records in business.

results.name: Manage your finances
results.description: Separate personal and duka finances. Payment of personal salaries, Proper record-keeping,  Repayment to the business any drawings of salary, Separate places for various monies,  Separate bank account for business.

results.name: Supply Chain
results.description: Identify elements of the supply chain for a duka. Understand the importance of managing the purchasing function.
